# Copilot Instructions

This is a PowerShell 7.2+ module project. For full conventions, architecture, build commands, and contribution workflow, read [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md).

Key file locations: `src/Public/` (exported), `src/Private/` (internal), `Tests/Unit/`, `Build/`, `Templates/`.

Before committing: `./Tests/test-local.ps1`
